TournamentController - Class in com.riskgame.controller
Tournament class contains all the methods to start the tournament mode, load the maps for the games based the number of maps selected by the user, save the objects of the GameMapGraph into different games, start the automated tournament game and finally display the tournament result of the differnt games

TournamentView - Class in com.riskgame.view
The Tournament View class is invoked for displaying the tournament view which takes all the details the information required for the tournament mode to begin
